item.title: Setting up doom emacs in Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Introduction In this post I will capture the steps required to install doom emacs in a fresh new install of Ubuntu 20.

item.title: Setting up an AI workstation

item.title: Launching a blog in 2022
item.description: Introduction January 2022. A new year starts, inmersed in COVID-19 pandemic. It’s that time of the year when everyone sets new goals and starts new projects.
